message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $12000. This is a fantastic deal considering its worth and could potentially save you thousands in the long run. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
